positiveIcons.description: Relax and recharge on the couch
Play and bond with your pets
Share love and romance with your partner
Be present and care for your child
Feel good about your work and progress
Talk to a professional when you need help
Enjoy a movie or show and unwind
Go on fun trips and adventures
Keep learning and growing every day

negativeIcons.description: Stress from constant numbers and calculations
Working in a stressful, polluted environment
Stuck in the corporate grind all the time
Endless screen time and notification overload
Work identity taking over your whole life
Frustration and burnout from work problems
Arguments at home because of work stress
Total burnout and zero energy from overwork
Stress from constant calls and crises
Big unpaid bills causing money stress
Unhealthy habit: smoking away the stress
Always at your desk, no time to move
Constant shouting and conflicts with others
Working so late you pass out at the desk
